channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- Endpoint Security Tools for Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitdefender -- Endpoint Security Tools for Linux

item.title: CVE-2021-3485|2024-09-16T16:28:38.711Z -- bitdefender -- endpoint%20security%20tools%20for%20linux
item.description: An Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the Product Update feature of Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools for Linux allows a man-in-the-middle attacker to abuse the DownloadFile function of the Product Update to achieve remote code execution. This issue affects: Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools for Linux versions prior to 6.2.21.155.
